definition: to marry/to tie the bridal veil
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: Today is the day my brother gets married.
sentences.chinese: 今天是哥哥和嫂子結縭的大喜日子。

sentences.english: His elder daughter is getting married today; what a happy scene.
sentences.chinese: 他的大女兒今天結縭了，真是值得慶賀。
